CutSceneText.Text: You've come, [%username]. I've got another job for you.
We have received information of a murder plot amongst the Elyos. Its hard to believe, but apparently the perpetrator is a knight.
I'm sure you know the influential Intelligence Staff Officer Keidian.
Has he been acting suspiciously of late?
Now that you mention it... He seemed shocked by one of the messages he received.
I did think he probably hadn't just disappeared by chance. But we managed to find his hideout.
We think he is holed up somewhere in part of the ruined Barat House in the geothermal Barat Zone.
As you would expect from an Intelligence Staff Officer, he is a proficient writer. If he notices that we are after him, he will vanish into thin air.
But if you approach him without troops and claim to be a turncoat like him, you might gain his trust.
Are you saying I have to take care of this guy by myself?
That would be good, but it's best to keep him alive at first so we can check a few things out.
There is a huge cellar in the Barat House. Use it.
This mission is strictly confidential as we don't know who is friend or foe.
We have drafted a fake letter containing information from the rebels. Show Keidian this letter.
If he turns up at the location mentioned in the letter, he'll give himself away.
Exactly. It seems that the Templars of the Tower of Light are showing solidarity with him. So you must be careful.
We'll infiltrate the area with a few soldiers then wait for you. I'm counting on you.
